content: {"name": "River Fund, Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food distribution on Wednesday's is for seniors only", "email": "", "url": "https://www.river.fund", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "89-11 Lefferts Blvd", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11418", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.69701200000001, "longitude": -73.8291295}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 441-1125", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Help with social services/public benefits"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
